query.statement:
SELECT A.LIFNR AS LIFNR ,B.NAME1 AS COMNAME ,A.BSU_HP AS BSU_HP ,A.BIZ_ARA AS BIZ_ARA ,A.BIZ_PM AS BIZ_PM ,A.WGBN AS WGBN ,A.TEMNO AS TEMNO ,A.ZZACTSS AS ZZACTSS ,CASE WHEN A.INST_GB='1' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS INST_GB ,A.BSU_ARA AS BSU_ARA ,A.BSU_PM AS BSU_PM ,CASE WHEN A.BSU_GB='1' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS BSU_GB ,A.VKGRP AS VKGRP ,'' AS FLAG FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS A RIGHT JOIN (
SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, NAME1, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MANDT,LIFNR ORDER BY MANDT,LIFNR,KTOKK DESC) AS ROWN FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
) AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR AND B.ROWN=1 WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND A.ZZACTSS <> ''
AND A.BSU_ARA<> ''
AND A.BIZ_ARA <> ''
AND A.ZZACTSS = '' AND A.BSU_ARA = '' AND A.BIZ_ARA = ''
ORDER BY A.MANDT,A.LIFNR,B.NAME1 WITH UR
